thread.title: Doom 3 keeps switching my map files to read only?

post.author: ]-[itman
post.body:
Is there a way I can stop this? All the files in the Doom 3 folder reset to read-only, and it ends up causing error messages when saving maps.

The bak files and such always pop up an error when saving, but this does not "seem" to cause any problems most of the time as far as I can tell. I just want to make sure as I am new to this editor.

Thanks for any help.
